dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui

Enum WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags>
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags>
    Enclosing class:
    WidgetFactory

    public static enum WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags
extends java.lang.Enum<WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags>
    Provides flags that control various features of a treetable
    Since:
    2009.a

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ACTION_ADD
      Add a button to add a new sibling row
      ACTION_ADD_CHILD
      Add a button to add a new child with default values
      ACTION_ALL
      Add all actions
      ACTION_COLLAPS
      Add a button to collapse tree
      ACTION_DUPLICATE
      Add a button to duplicate rows
      ACTION_EXPAND
      Add a button to expand tree
      ACTION_FILTER
      Add a button to select shown columns
      ACTION_NONE
      Add no actions
      ACTION_REMOVE
      Add a button to remove rows
      FIXED_COLUMN_WIDTH
      Disable sorting of columns
      HIDE_COLUMN_TYPE_ICON
      Hide type icon of table column in table header
      HIDE_DEFAULT_ICONS
      Hide the folder and file icons that are shown in the tree by default
      HIDE_DISABLED_BGCOLOR
      Hide the disabled background color for disabled columns
      HIDE_HEADER
      Hide the column headers of the table
      HIDE_LINES
      Hide the lines between the table rows
      SHOW_READONLY_ROW_CONTENT
      Shows content of rows at a read-only level.
      SINGLE_ROW_SELECTION
      Disable sorting of columns

      • SHOW_READONLY_ROW_CONTENT

        public static final WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags SHOW_READONLY_ROW_CONTENT
        Shows content of rows at a read-only level. By default, the content (except the tree column) is not shown at a read-only level.
        Since:
        12.0
